english: if you know what's good for you,
and I will give you a girl,
She won't pretend to refuse you,

original: hy a vyʒ gwreg ty da
english: She will be a good wife

original: Lemen yʒ torn my as re
modern: Lemmyn y'th torn my a's re
english: Now I give her into your hand

original: ha war an greyʒ my an te
modern: ha war an Grys my a'n te
english: and on the Creed I swear
that there is not her equal

original: an barʒ ma ʒe pons tamar
modern: a'n barth ma dhe bons Tamar.
english: from here to the Tamar Bridge.

original: my ad pes worty byʒ da
modern: My a'th pes, orti bydh da
english: I beg you, be good to her,

original: ag ol ʒe voʒ hy a wra
modern: hag oll dha vodh hi a wra
english: and she will do as you wish,

original: rag flog yw ha gensy soʒ
modern: rag flogh yw ha gensi doth
english: for she is a child and well-behaved,

original: ha gassy ʒe gafus hy boʒ
modern: hag a fi dhe gavòs hy bodh.
english: and scorns to have her own way.

original: dallaʒ a var infreʒ dar war
mar aʒ herg ʒys gul nep tra
modern: Mara'th ergh dhis gul neb tra,
english: If he bids you do something,
Say to him, "Do it if you wish."

original: awos a gallo na wra tra vyʒ
modern: Awos a allo, na wra tra vyth.
english: In spite of all he can, do nothing.

original: in vrna yʒ sens ʒe ves meystres
modern: Y'n eur na y'th sens dhe vos mestres
english: Then he will consider you a mistress and
a lady, as long as you live.

original: cas o ganso re nofferen [[note: Williams (2020) reads this as "ras".]]
english: He was gracious, by the Mass.
He will do you no harm.
